== Methods ==
=== Lidar DEM production ===
* DEMs interpolated with progressive morphological filtering [[Zhang et al. (2003)]]
* RMSE between the lidar DEMs and 30,000 GC points was 0.15m
* Merged Lidar, airborne height finder (AHF), and USGS 30x30m DEMs
